scripts.create: terraform workspace new env1 && terraform worokspace new env2
scripts.apply:env1: terraform workspace select env1 && terraform apply -var-file=secret\env1.tfvars -var-file=terraform.tfvars -auto-approve
scripts.apply:env2: terraform workspace select env2 && terraform apply -var-file=secret\env2.tfvars -var-file=terraform.tfvars -auto-approve
scripts.apply:all: npm run apply:env1 && npm run apply:env2
